subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: If the Mets land Chris Young, their intellectually formidable pitching staff will include a Princeton man, a Phi Beta Kappa from Duke and the well-read R. A. Dickey.
snippet: If the Mets land Chris Young, their intellectually formidable pitching staff will include a Princeton man, a Phi Beta Kappa from Duke and the well-read R. A. Dickey.
